nodes.text: Pan Eyta's Tempest was one of the three Tempests within the Nihil and was led by the Tempest Runner, Pan Eyta. It consisted of about one thousand members. As many Nihil who served in a Tempest took after their Runner, the Nihil of this Tempest were considered to be thinkers and often dressed flamboyantly. This fancy way of acting and dressing was considered disgusting and contradictory by Nihil of other Tempests.
